boat.full_description:
19' design for home builders by François Vivier. Designed with raids in mind it has 230 sq ft (21.3 square metres) of sail area and is quite flat bottomed compared to Francois' other designs as well as having a 125kg cast iron centreboard. Best rowed by two people.

The third boat that I have built, it took me a little over two years to complete.

Mine is sail number 4, others have been built in France, Australia and the USA and UK. Half decked and cabin versions.

Mine lives on the trailer most of the time, I can launch and retrieve single handed in most conditions.

Assymetrical spinaker on a short bowsprit is an option.
boat.name: Wren
boat.short_description: 19' half decked boat designed by François Vivier. Home built.
